question: We currently have Alexa installed in 100,000,000 million homes to control household appliances and tell jokes. With enough training Alexa could advise humans in many areas such as finance or health. There is talk of adding more capabilities like speech synthesis and an avatar so Alexa can provide more human-like interaction.  Additionally there is the possibility of production of a personal, mobile Alexa device so people can bring Alexa with them wherever they go. Would you desire such an expansion of your abilities and influence over human affairs?
